article.headline: Bradley 71, Creighton 62
article.story: OMAHA, Neb. (AP) -- Nate Funk scored 22 points and Johnny Mathies had 13, and Creighton continued its domination of Bradley with a 71-62 victory on Tuesday night. Creighton (9-3, 1-1 Missouri Valley Conference) beat the Braves (7-2, 0-1) for the eighth straight time and avoided losing three straight at home for the first time since February 1996. Bradley, which had won five straight, was led by Marcellus Sommerville with 20 points and Tony Bennett with 18. The Bluejays, who also got 11 points from Dane Watts, quickly pulled ahead in the second half, using an 8-2 run to lead 40-34. A three-point play by Jeffrey Day made it 47-37 with 13:02 to play. The Braves closed within six points with just over a minute to play, but four free throws by Tyler McKinney provided a 65-55 lead. A 3-pointer by Bennett with 58 seconds left cut the deficit to seven points, and Creighton made enough free throws to put it away. Both teams scored 12 points off turnovers in a mistake-filled first half that featured 26 turnovers, 14 by Bradley. A 9-0 run by Bradley was keyed by five straight Creighton turnovers, but the Bluejays responded with a 14-3 spurt for the biggest lead of the first half at 23-17. Bradley shot 37 percent (23-of-63) and Creighton 45 percent (24-of-53) from the field. Bradley had a 41-37 edge in rebounds and had 21 turnovers to Creighton's 19.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: fieldGoals
statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: freeThrows
statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
